title: The Next Installment of Mystery Case Files is Coming
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/12/2015 @ 3:37 PM Companies mentioned in this article: Big Fish 
SEATTLE, Oct. 12, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Big Fish is excited to announce the next installment of the fan favorite hidden-object series Mystery Case Files coming soon to PC and Mac. In the 12th installment of this intriguing series, players return to the Gothic-style seek-and-find world they know and love. This game may be the most anticipated MCF chapter to-date, with exceptional pre-release buzz. 
The Dalimar legacy continues as you're called to investigate why ships are suddenly disappearing near the ruins of Ravenhearst Manor. Soon you discover that the manor itself is being recreated--as a museum! But there's more than tribute and history behind its diabolical design. Find out the museum's true purpose--and who's behind it--in this powerful story line from Eipix! 
Players must navigate the world of MCF by solving mysteries and gathering hidden clues. By playing through intricate and atmospheric puzzles and mini-games, the mystery is slowly revealed. 
The game also includes: -- 18 hidden-object puzzles to solve throughout the Ravenhearst estate! -- 41 mini-games, including five challenging mega-puzzles! -- 34 collectibles hidden within the scenes. -- 16 morphing objects to find! -- 20 achievements to earn! -- 44 souvenirs to collect! -- Play the bonus game to get a glimpse into the tortured mind of Benedict Caldwell. -- Replay all mini-games and hidden-object puzzles! -- Strategy Guide included with the game. 
If you ever get stuck or need a little help, you can visit the Strategy Guide included in the game. Can you defeat the evils of a legacy that refuses to be put to rest? 
Brought to you by Big Fish Games, the leading global marketplace to discover and enjoy casual games, Mystery Case files is one of the most successful puzzle adventure franchises. Other titles in the series include Mystery Case Files: Return to Ravenhearst and Mystery Case Files: Dire Grove . 
Pricing and Availability Mystery Case Files: Key to Ravenhearst will be available exclusively at www.bigfishgames.com . The trial version will be available to download and play for free; the full Collector's Edition version will be available for $19.99 (U.S.). Big Fish Game Club members get a 30% discount off the price. 
About Big Fish Founded in 2002, Big Fish is the world's largest producer and distributor of casual games, delivering fun to millions of people around the world. Through its mobile and online distribution platforms, Big Fish has distributed more than 2.5 billion games to customers in 150 countries from a growing catalogue of 450+ unique mobile games and 3,500+ unique PC games. After successfully transitioning from a PC-centric to a mobile-centric company, Big Fish has emerged as a top grossing mobile publisher worldwide with a portfolio that includes hit games like Big Fish Casino and Gummy Drop! The company is headquartered in Seattle, WA, with regional offices in Oakland, CA, and Luxembourg. 
Contact: Conor Murphy, press@bigfishgames.com
